Dialogue.Page: This piece of Nomai writing was essential in allowing a Hearthian to learn from the Nomai's many discoveries.
One of the Nomai in this writing survived the arrival of the Interloper aboard a station at the center of Giant's Deep.
They would use an advanced projection stone to voyage outside of the station to learn what had happened, and to study the deadly matter that had taken their clan.
We were never able to learn the secrets locked behind the great door on Timber Hearth.
